name: Go To Car Driving 3
description: Go To Car Driving 3 is about a man in whose life situations often occur, during which you have to save animals, such as cats, owls, etc. In addition, in this big city, you can buy and drive your favorite equipment, such as a drone, a plane, a helicopter, a flying saucer (UFO), etc. In addition, you can go to the club to dance in different styles, you can take the subway to another city. You have to drive very carefully in this big city, because the great control of the police will not give you peace of mind. You can go to town, And from there go to the airport, and fly a big plane. The city's large streets allow cars to drive at very high speeds. He can also use the structures. You can dress your character in your favorite style. In this game there are modern special effects, musical editing. We would like to inform you that, The game is not a clone of GTA V or GTA San Andreas. The game has its own unique story. Many mechanics and actions are branded, which is not in other games of this style.
